meanings.definition: Extend over so as to cover partly.
meanings.sent1: The roof of the house overlaps the walls slightly.
meanings.sent2: The two blankets overlap on the bed.
meanings.sent3: The cat's tail and the dog's tail overlap when they wag simultaneously.
meanings.sent4: Her responsibilities at work and at home overlap, making her schedule hectic.
meanings.sent5: The branches of the trees overlap, creating a beautiful canopy of leaves.

meanings.definition: To coincide partially in time, subject, etc.
meanings.sent1: The meeting overlaps with my lunch break.
meanings.sent2: Our schedules overlap on weekends, so we can spend time together.
meanings.sent3: The movie's soundtrack overlaps with the sound of rain outside, creating a unique atmosphere.
meanings.sent4: His interests in music and sports overlap, making him a well-rounded individual.
meanings.sent5: The colors of the two paintings overlap, blending into a mesmerizing display.

meanings.definition: To have something in common with.
meanings.sent1: My taste in movies overlaps with hers.
meanings.sent2: Our opinions on the matter overlap significantly.
meanings.sent3: The ingredients in the two recipes overlap, so I can make both dishes with what I have.
meanings.sent4: Their goals for the project overlap, ensuring smooth collaboration.
meanings.sent5: The themes of the two books overlap, exploring similar ideas in different settings.
